title: PHP Loops
description: Use for, while, and foreach loops in PHP to repeat tasks and iterate over arrays.
constraints: Use at least one for loop.
Use at least one while or do...while loop.
starterCode:
<?php
// Example array
$fruits = ["Apple", "Banana", "Cherry"];

// Write your loops here
?>
hints: for is used when you know the number of iterations.
while runs until a condition is false.
